snippet: The proposed changes to teacher education programs would make schools report how many graduates fill shortage positions, how satisfied school principals are with their preparation and how the graduates help students learn.
lead_paragraph: The proposed changes to teacher education programs would make schools report how many graduates fill shortage positions, how satisfied school principals are with their preparation and how the graduates help students learn.

headline.main: Changes Proposed for Reporting by Teacher Education Programs
headline.print_headline: Changes Proposed for Reporting By Teacher Education Programs
